channel.title: Leadership on Atazzo
channel.description: Recent content in Leadership on Atazzo

item.title: Process
item.description: Rapid growth introduces additional complexity in both technological and organizational structure. We help companies design and implement lightweight processes that help sustain and increase successful growth.

item.title: Technology
item.description: Whether it’s Data Science and Machine Learning or scalability challenges with technology architecture, we help growing companies with their unique technology challenges. We have extensive experience in high-performance systems and real-time systems in a variety of industries.
